verbose_text: In canonical Wnt signaling mediated by beta-catenin, the ligands, Wnt10a and Wnt10b, bind to frizzled 1 (FZD1) receptors and low-density lipoprotein receptor related protein (LRP) 5/6 co-receptors leading to the phosphorylation of dishevelled segment polarity protein (DVL) and the degradation of Axin, followed by hypophosphorylation and the nuclear translocation of beta-catenin.
evidence: phosphorylation of dishevelled segment polarity protein (DVL
